CustomField.description: Converting 'mkto_si__Last_Interesting_Moment_Date__c' (which is date/time data type) value to 'Date' datatype inorder to create 'Days Since Last Interesting Moment' field - as per Jira#SDS-2961
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date format of 'Last Interesting Moment Date' field
CustomField.label: Last Interesting Moment Date conversion
